<s>have been unable to confirm them.<\s>
[Reil, Arnold & Owen held fast to the <s>statement
idea <\s> view that the corpus callosum is purely an inter=
convolutional commissure of the two hemispheres.
The last of these writes (The anatomy of Vertebrates vol III.
p. 141.) “There is no actual continuity of any of 
the ascending radiating fibres of the crus cerebri 
with those wh: spread out in transverse curves 
from the corpus callosum. The two systems are 
closely interlaced: but the fibrous character of the 
commissural series is lost, under the microscope,
before it quits the ventricular to descend, with 
the radiating fibres, into the crus.”
